attributes.name: SystemKey Access via Command Line v100.0.1
attributes.description: Keychains are the built-in way for macOS to keep track of users' passwords and credentials for many services and features, including Wi-Fi and website passwords, secure notes, certificates, and Kerberos. Adversaries may collect the keychain storage data from a system to acquire credentials.
author: Elastic
attributes.query:
event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and
  process.args:("/private/var/db/SystemKey" or "/var/db/SystemKey")
